publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1432 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Sitting Days-That the Parliament agrees that between 8 January 2001 and 11 January 2002 (inclusive) the office of the Clerk will be open on all days except: Saturdays and Sundays, 13 April, 16 April, 7 May, 25 May, 28 May, 30 November, 24 December (PM), 25 December, 26 December 2001, 1 January 2002 and 2 January 2002. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
